solution_line_template: Gargamel saved ${total_savings} for all four tires, so to find the savings per tire was ${total_savings} / {num_tires} = ${<<{total_savings}/{num_tires}={savings_per_tire}>>}{savings_per_tire} saved per tire.

Adding the savings to the discount price, the original price was ${sale_price_per_tire} + ${savings_per_tire} = ${<<{sale_price_per_tire}+{savings_per_tire}={original_price_per_tire}>>}{original_price_per_tire}
